articles.title: New IRS Scam Targeting Seniors in California
articles.content: Scammers are impersonating IRS agents and threatening seniors with arrest warrants for unpaid taxes. They demand immediate payment via gift cards and claim Medicare benefits will be cancelled.

articles.title: Grandparent Scam Alert: Fake Emergency Calls on the Rise
articles.content: Criminals are calling elderly individuals claiming to be their grandchildren in urgent need of bail money. They use emotional manipulation and request secrecy from other family members.

articles.title: Medicare Open Enrollment Scams Target Seniors
articles.content: Fraudsters are calling seniors claiming they need to verify Medicare information or risk losing coverage. They ask for Social Security numbers and banking details.
